member.name: P:Hamazon.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI.Application.SwaggerUIOptions.RoutePrefix
member.summary: Set a custom route prefix for accessing the swagger-ui.

member.name: M:Hamazon.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI.Application.SwaggerUIOptions.InjectStylesheet(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Inject additional CSS stylesheets into the swagger-ui HTML page
member.param: A path to the stylesheet - i.e. the link "href" attribute
The target media - i.e. the link "media" attribute

member.name: M:Hamazon.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI.Application.SwaggerUIOptions.SwaggerEndpoint(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Provide one or more Swagger JSON endpoints. Can be fully-qualified or relative to the UI page
member.param: Can be fully qualified or relative to the current host
The description that appears in the document selector drop-down

member.name: M:Hamazon.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI.Application.SwaggerUIOptions.EnabledValidator(System.String)
member.summary: You can use this parameter to set a different validator URL. See swagger-ui project for more info

member.name: M:Hamazon.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI.Application.SwaggerUIOptions.BooleanValues(System.Object[])
member.summary: You can use this parameter to change the values in "boolean" dropdowns. See swagger-ui project for more info

member.name: M:Hamazon.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI.Application.SwaggerUIOptions.DocExpansion(System.String)
member.summary: Controls how the API listing is displayed. See swagger-ui project for more info

member.name: M:Hamazon.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI.Application.SwaggerUIOptions.SupportedSubmitMethods(System.String[])
member.summary: An array of of the HTTP operations that will have the 'Try it out!' option. See swagger-ui project for more info

member.name: M:Hamazon.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI.Application.SwaggerUIOptions.InjectOnCompleteJavaScript(System.String)
member.summary: Inject one or more JavaScripts to invoke when the swagger-ui has successfully loaded
member.param: A path (fully qualified or relative to the current host) to the script

member.name: M:Hamazon.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI.Application.SwaggerUIOptions.InjectOnFailureJavaScript(System.String)
member.summary: Inject one or more JavaScripts to invoke if the swagger-ui fails to load
member.param: A path (fully qualified or relative to the current host) to the script

member.name: M:Hamazon.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI.Application.SwaggerUIOptions.ShowRequestHeaders
member.summary: Show headers that were sent when making a request via the 'Try it out!' option. See swagger-ui project for more info

member.name: M:Hamazon.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI.Application.SwaggerUIOptions.ShowJsonEditor
member.summary: Enables a graphical view for editing complex bodies. See swagger-ui project for more info

member.name: M:Hamazon.AspNetCore.SwaggerUI.Application.SwaggerUIOptions.ConfigureOAuth2(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Enable OAuth2 UI Interactions. See swagger-ui project for more info.
